{"step_by_step_thinking": "Von Hippel-Lindau disease is a genetic condition characterized by the growth of tumors and cysts in many parts of the body. Pazopanib is a type of medication known as a tyrosine kinase inhibitor, which is used to treat kidney cancer and soft tissue sarcoma. Recent studies have shown that pazopanib can be effective in treating the tumors associated with von Hippel-Lindau disease.", "answer_choice": "A"}
